name: Louie
text: SPRING THE TRAP While this character is being challenged, the challenging character gets -1 {S}.
flavor_text: "The snakes are cool, I guess. Pretty standard trap, though."

name: Dewey
flavor_text: "Snakes? Firing lasers? In a secret underground lair? No problem!"

name: Huey
text: I KNOW THE WAY Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {I} less for the next character you play this turn.
flavor_text: "Forget the magical snakes. There's the way out of the trap!"

name: Goofy
text: PLENTY TO GO AROUND At the end of your turn, you may remove up to 1 damage from each of your other characters. Ready each character you removed damage from this way.
flavor_text: "You're just in time for Surprise Ã  la Goof!"

name: Antonio Madrigal
text: OF COURSE THEY CAN COME Once during your turn, whenever one of your characters sings a song, you may search your deck for a character card with cost 3 or less and reveal that card to all players. Put that card into your hand and shuffle your deck.

name: Minnie Mouse
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
TRUE VALOR This character gets +1 {S} for each 1 damage on her.

name: Ludwig Von Drake
text:
SUPERIOR MIND When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of your choice.
LASTING LEGACY When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Charlotte La Bouff
flavor_text: "Seems like only yesterday we were both little girls dreaming our fairy tale dreams, and tonight they're finally coming true."

name: Tiana
text:
Singer 6 (This character counts as cost 6 to sing songs.)
CAPTIVATING MELODY Whenever you play a song, each opposing character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

name: Mirabel Madrigal
text: YOU ARE A WONDER When you play this character, you may reveal a song card in your hand to gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: "Whatever gift awaits will be just as special as you." âAlma Madrigal

name: Lady
text: SOMEONE TO CARE FOR When you play this character, you may play a character with cost 2 or less for free.
flavor_text: She's happiest in the company of those she loves.

name: Jim Dear
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavor_text: Family is family no matter what.

name: Gene
text: I GUESS YOU EARNED THIS Whenever this character quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
flavor_text: "Getting a medal feels pretty great. Making Gene squirm feels even better." âWreck-It Ralph

name: Perdita
text: KEEPING WATCH While you have a Puppy character in play, this character gets +1 {W}.
flavor_text: "Where did the forest go? Stay close, my darlings. Something's amiss here." âPerdita

name: Rhino
text: TINY HOWL When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.
flavor_text: "I eat danger for breakfast."

name: Darling Dear
text: HOW SWEET When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 {L} this turn.
flavor_text: "I don't imagine anything could ever take her place in our hearts."

name: The Colonel
text: WE'VE GOT 'EM OUTNUMBERED While you have 3 or more Puppy characters in play, this character gets +2 {S} and +2 {L}.
flavor_text: His training was invaluable in infiltrating the palace.

name: Chief Bogo
text: SENDING BACKUP During an opponent's turn, whenever one of your characters with Bodyguard is banished, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card with cost 5 or less, you may play that character for free. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

name: Pua
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
FREE FRUIT When this character is banished, you may draw a card.

name: Bruno Madrigal
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Bruno Madrigal.)
BRIGHT FUTURE Whenever this character sings a song, you may draw a card for each character you have in play.

name: Kaa
text: LOOK ME IN THE EYE Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -2 {S} and gains Reckless until the start of your next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)
flavor_text: "You have just made a s-serious mis-sstake, my friend."

name: Tramp
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tramp.)
PLAY IT COOL During an opponentâs turn, whenever one of your characters is banished, you may draw a card.

name: King Candy
text: A NEW ROSTER When this character is banished, you may return another Racer character card from your discard to your hand.

name: Wreck-It Ralph
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Wreck-It Ralph.)
BACK ON TRACK When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may return a Racer character card with cost 6 or less from your discard to your hand. If you do, gain 1 lore.

name: Patch
text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
PUPPY BARKING While you have another Puppy character in play, this character gets +1 {L}.
flavor_text: Sand sure was more fun than it looked!

name: Rolly
text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
ADORABLE ANTICS When you play this character, you may put a character card from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Perdita
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Perdita.)
QUICK, EVERYONE HIDE When you play this character, you may put all Puppy character cards from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Pluto
text: HAPPY HELPER While this character has no damage, he gets +2 {S} and gains Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

name: Bolt
text: NONE OF YOUR POWERS ARE WORKING This character enters play exerted.
flavor_text: "The only power you need is the power of AWESOMENESS!" âRhino

name: Rhino
text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Rhino.)
EPIC BALL OF AWESOME While this character has no damage, he gains Resist +2. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

name: Antonio's Jaguar
text: YOU WANT TO GO WHERE? When you play this character, if you have a character named Antonio Madrigal in play, gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: "He knows the way through. Just try to keep up!" âAntonio

name: Calhoun
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
LOOT DROP When this character is banished, gain 1 lore.

name: Lady
text:
PACK OF HER OWN Whenever you play a character, this character gets +1 {S} this turn.
TAKE THE LEAD While this character has 3 {S} or more, she gets +2 {L}.

name: Alma Madrigal
text: THE MIRACLE IS YOU Once during your turn, whenever one or more of your characters sings a song, you may ready those characters.
flavor_text: "I'm sorry I held on too tight."

name: Clawhauser
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

name: Joey
text: I'VE GOT JUST THE THING Whenever this character quests, you may remove up to 1 damage from each of your characters with Bodyguard.
flavor_text: "If you need fixin', ol' Joey's on the job."

name: Donald Duck
text:
HERE, PIGGY, PIGGY For each item named The Nephews' Piggy Bank you have in play, you pay 2 {I} less to play this character.
MONEY EVERYWHERE When you play this character, your other characters gain "{E} â Draw a card" this turn.

name: Dalmatian Puppy
text: WHERE DID THEY ALL COME FROM? You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy â Tail Wagger in your deck.
flavor_text: "Oh boy! A new friend to play with!"

name: Candy Drift
text: Draw a card. Chosen character of yours gets +5 {S} this turn. At the end of your turn, banish them.
flavor_text:
"This will overheat your engine like a sack of cinnamon candy, so you better win quick!"
âVanellope von Schweetz

name: She's Your Person
text:
Choose one:
- Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character.
- Remove up to 3 damage from each of your characters with Bodyguard.

name: Only So Much Room
text: Return chosen character with 2 {S} or less to their player's hand. Return a character card from your discard to your hand.
flavor_text: "Home wreckers! That's what they are!" âTramp

name: It Means No Worries
text:
Sing Together 9 (Any number of your or your teammatesâ characters with total cost 9 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return up to 3 character cards from your discard to your hand. You pay 2 {I} less for the next character you play this turn.

name: Trials and Tribulations
text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gets -4 {S} until the start of your next turn.

name: The Nephews' Piggy Bank
text:
INSIDE JOB If you have a character named Donald Duck in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this item.
PAYOFF {E} â Chosen character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

name: Palace Guard
text: Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)
flavor_text: "All of the power of the normal guards, with none of the insolence." âJafar

name: Druun
text: Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character gets +4 {S}.)
flavor_text:
"They've always been here. Waiting for a moment of weakness to attack."
âSisu

name: Madame Medusa
text: DOUBLE-CROSS When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to return chosen character with cost 2 or less to their playerâs hand.

name: Hades
text: SHORT ON PATIENCE When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: "Don't forgetâI'm the guy with the leverage here."

name: Lena Sabrewing
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
SUPERNATURAL VENGEANCE {E} â Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

name: Abu
text:
Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)
GRASPING TRUNK Whenever this character quests, gain lore equal to the {L} of chosen opposing character.

name: Bruno Madrigal
text: STANDING TALL When you play this character, chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.
flavor_text: "I'm not in the vision business right now. I'm in the stopping you business."

name: Royal Guard
text: HEAVILY ARMED Whenever you draw a card, this character gains Challenger +1 this turn. (They get +1 {S} while challenging.)

name: Kuzco
text: LLAMA BREATH When you play this character, you may return chosen character, item, or location with cost 2 or less to their player's hand.
flavor_text: "Wait'll they get a whiff of thisÂ .Â .Â ."

name: Megara
text: CONTENTIOUS ALLIANCE While you have a character named Hades in play, this character gains Challenger +2. (They get +2 {S} while challenging.)
flavor_text: The sooner we get this done, the sooner I'm freeÂ .Â .Â . of you.

name: Yelana
text: WE ONLY TRUST NATURE When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging.)

name: Ryder
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: Sheesh, what is it with this high sultan guy? Can't he put in stairs like a normal person?

name: Bambi
flavor_text: As he grew older, he began to understand his responsibilities to all the creatures of the woods.

name: Poe De Spell
flavor_text: "Sister, dear, if we turn all the townspeople into frogs, who will give us our gold and turnips?"

name: Madam Mim
flavor_text: "They think they know my tricks . . . Oh, this one's going to be marvelously malicious!"

name: Elsa
text: ICE OVER 1 {I} , Choose and discard a card â Exert chosen opposing character.
flavor_text: "I have to protect my sister. You're not going anywhere!"

name: Pinocchio
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
GOT TO KEEP REAL QUIET Once during your turn, whenever you ready this character, you may draw a card.

name: Jiminy Cricket
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
ENOUGH'S ENOUGH While this character is exerted, opposing characters with Rush enter play exerted.

name: Bambi
text:
SAY HELLO When you play this character, gain 1 lore.
KIND OF BASHFUL When an opponent plays a character, return this character to your hand.

name: Monstro
text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
FULL BREACH Choose and discard a card â Ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

name: Nero
text: AND MEAN {E} â Move 1 damage counter from this character to chosen opposing character.
flavor_text: He's identical to Brutus in temperament and toothiness.

name: Magica De Spell
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
DANCE OF DARKNESS When you play this character, you may return one of your other characters to your hand to draw a card.

name: Kuzco
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kuzco.)
WHAT DOES THIS DO? When you play this character, each opponent chooses one of their characters and puts that card on the bottom of their deck. Then, each opponent may draw a card.

name: Yzma
text: WHY DO WE EVEN HAVE THAT LEVER? When you play this character, if you have a card named Pull the Lever! in your discard, you may search your deck for a card named Wrong Lever! and reveal that card to all players. Put that card into your hand and shuffle your deck.

name: Madam Mim
text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Madam Mim.)
MAKE WAY, COMING THROUGH! When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand.

name: Mother Gothel
text: LOOK WHAT YOU'VE DONE When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to give that character Challenger +1 and "When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand" this turn. (They get +1 {S} while challenging.)

name: Blue Fairy
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

name: Anna
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Anna.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen characterâs {S} this turn.)
COORDINATED PLAN Whenever this character quests, if you have a character named Elsa in play, you may draw a card.

name: The Sultan
text:
Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)
COMMANDING PRESENCE Whenever one of your Illusion characters quests, exert chosen opposing character.

name: Jafar
text: DARK POWER Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card. If an Illusion character card is discarded this way, you may play that character for free.

name: Camilo Madrigal
text: ENCORE! ENCORE! When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand.
flavor_text: "My primo Camilo won't stop until he makes you smile today." âMirabel

name: Flower
text: LOOKING FOR FRIENDS Whenever you play another character, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
flavor_text: His sweet nature outmatches all the blooms in the meadow.

name: Forest Duel
text: Your characters gain Challenger +2 and "When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand" this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging.)
flavor_text: Fight with honor, win with dignity.

name: They Never Come Back
text: Up to 2 chosen characters can't ready at the start of their next turn. Draw a card.
flavor_text: "You boys have had your fun. Now, pay for it." âThe Coachman

name: Fantastical and Magical
text:
Sing Together 9 (Any number of your or your teammatesâ characters with total cost 9 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
For each character that sang this song, draw a card and gain 1 lore.

name: Pull the Lever!
text:
Choose one:
- Draw 2 cards.
- Each opponent chooses and discards a card.

name: Into the Unknown
text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Put chosen exerted character into their player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Everybody's Got a Weakness
text: Move 1 damage counter from each damaged character you have in play to chosen opposing character. Draw a card for each damage counter moved this way.

name: Scarab
text: SEARCH THE SANDS {E} 2 {I} â Return an Illusion character card from your discard to your hand.
flavor_text: "If we can catch one, maybe we can recalibrate it to help us get rid of Jafar's illusions!" âVenturo, an Illumineer

name: Ice Spikes
text:
HOLD STILL When you play this item, exert chosen opposing character.
IT'S STUCK {E}, 1 {I} â Exert chosen opposing item. It canât ready at the start of its next turn.

name: Wilhelmina Packard
flavor_text:
Helga: "Sounds metallic. Could be an echo off one of the rocks."
Wilhelmina: "Do you want to do my job? Be my guest."

name: Basil
text:
INCAPACITATE When you play this character, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.
INTERFERE Whenever this character quests, chosen opponent discards a card at random.

name: Tramp
text: HOW DO I GET IN? When you play this character, chosen character gains Ward until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
flavor_text: One glance at the tiny tracks, and his protective instincts kicked in.

name: Chaca
text: IN CAHOOTS When you play this character, if you have a character named Tipo in play, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

name: Tipo
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: "This is so much fun, Chaca! I want to go higher!"

name: Bill the Lizard
text: NOTHING TO IT While another character in play has damage, this character gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
flavor_text: "We need a lazard with a lizard!" âWhite Rabbit

name: March Hare
text: LIGHT THE CANDLES When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.
flavor_text: He really knows how to light up a room.

name: Fred
text: SPITTING FIRE! When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.
flavor_text: Don't be alarmed. It is just a suit. This is not my real face and body.

name: Mad Dog
text: ARE YOU SURE THIS IS SAFE, CAPTAIN? If you have a character named Don Karnage in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
flavor_text: He certainly isn't the brains of the operation.

name: Dale
flavor_text: "You're the fearless copilot who can handle any job.... Did I say fearless? I meant brainless!" âChip

name: Louis
text:
SENSITIVE SOUL This character enters play exerted.
FRIENDLIER THAN HE LOOKS When you play this character, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

name: Napoleon
flavor_text: Everyone knows that without rations, an operation'll be a failure. And this is why I outrank you, Lafayette. 'Cause I see the big picture.

name: Chip
text: IâLL HANDLE THIS When you play this character, chosen opponent chooses and discards a card.
flavor_text: "Don't worry, Dale! I've got you!"

name: Fred
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Fred.)
I LIKE WHERE THIS IS HEADING Whenever this character quests, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Floodborn character card. Put that card into your hand and shuffle the rest into your deck.

name: Gadget Hackwrench
text: GOLLY! When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "The scarab's power source! I knew that if I dug around I'd find it!"

name: Raya
text: UNCONVENTIONAL TACTICS Whenever this character quests, you may pay 2 {I} to ready another chosen character.

name: Rapunzel
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
WRAPPED UP Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

name: Flynn Rider
text: THIS IS A VERY BIG DAY Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging player may choose and discard a card. If they don't, you gain 2 lore.
flavor_text: "One way or another, I get what I want."

name: Dormouse
text: VERY RUDE INDEED When you play this character, you may put 1 damage counter on chosen character.
flavor_text: The tea is strong, even if he isn't.

name: Alice
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Alice.)
ACCIDENT PRONE Whenever this character quests, put 1 damage counter on each other character.

name: Queen of Hearts
text: COUNT OFF! While there are 5 or more characters with damage in play, this character gets +3 {L}.
flavor_text: She'll go wherever she pleases, no matter who she has to step on to get there.

name: Hiro Hamada
text: LOOK FOR A NEW ANGLE {E} â Ready chosen Floodborn character.

name: Go Go Tomago
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Go Go Tomago.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
ZERO RESISTANCE When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, you may put chosen character into their player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Don Karnage
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
SCORNFUL TAUNT Whenever you play an action that isnât a song, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They canât quest and must challenge if able.)

name: Captain Hook
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.)
GIVE âEM ALL YOU GOT! Once during your turn, whenever an opposing character is damaged, your Pirate characters get +2 {S} and gain Resist +2 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

name: Maui
text:
I'M NOT FINISHED YET When this character is banished, choose one:
- Put 2 damage counters on all opposing characters.
- Banish all opposing items.
- Banish all opposing locations.

name: Honey Lemon
text: LET'S DO THIS! Whenever you play a Floodborn character, if you used Shift to play them, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.

name: Jock
text: VOICE OF EXPERIENCE When you play this character, if you have 3 or more other characters in play, gain 2 lore.
flavor_text: "Settle in, ye wee pups, and let Uncle Jock tell ye a story about some Illumineers and a mad adventure . . ."

name: Archimedes
text:
YOU DON'T NEED THAT When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.
NOW, THAT'S NOT BAD During your turn, whenever an item is banished, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

name: He Who Steals and Runs Away
text: Banish chosen item. Draw a card.
flavor_text: Lives to steal another day!

name: Stopped Chaos in Its Tracks
text:
Sing Together 8 (Any number of your or your teammatesâ characters with total cost 8 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return up to 2 chosen characters with 3 {S} or less each to their player's hand.

name: Wrong Lever!
text:
Choose one:
- Return chosen character to their player's hand.
- Put a Pull the Lever! card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck to put chosen character on the bottom of their owner's deck.

name: Undermine
text: Chosen opponent chooses and discards a card. Chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn.
flavor_text: "It's a real shame I didn't even get a chance to study it."

name: Walk the Plank!
text: Your Pirate characters gain "{E} â Banish chosen damaged character" this turn.
flavor_text: It was at this point that John decided he'd had quite enough adventure.

name: Chem Purse
text: HERE'S THE BEST PART Whenever you play a character, if you used Shift to play them, they get +4 {S} this turn.
flavor_text: "Cute, but also potentially devastating. Perfect." âHoney Lemon

name: Jeweled Collar
text: WELCOME EXTRAVAGANCE Whenever one of your characters is challenged, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: Archazia created many wondrous things, but none as beautiful as this.

name: Gloyd Orangeboar
text: PUMPKIN SPICE When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore and you gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: "I've got tricks for my opponents and treats for my fans!"

name: Honest John
flavor_text: "Say, jewels just lying around in a fancy joint like this? It would be a shame if a few went missing..."

name: Gyro Gearloose
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
I'LL SHOW YOU! When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -3 {S} this turn.

name: Vanellope Von Schweetz
text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
flavor_text: "I can handle anything you throw at me... Wait, are those laser snakes? This is the best track ever!"

name: Brutus
text: SPITEFUL During your turn, when this character is banished, if one of your characters was damaged this turn, gain 2 lore.
flavor_text: He's identical to Nero in cruelty and classiness.

name: The Dodo
text: EXTRAORDINARY SITUATION This character gets +1 {S} for each 1 damage on him.
flavor_text: "And there I was in the cave below the palace when suddenly sand began pouring down. Did I stop? No! What's a little sand?"

name: Alice
text: THIS WAY OUT When you play this character, you may ready chosen damaged character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: "Goodness, those scarabs are awfully close! We must find the way out!"

name: Lumiere
text: QUICK-STEP While you have an item card in your discard, this character gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
flavor_text: "Sacrebleu! This is no way to treat a guest in your palace!"

name: Gaston
text: BREAK APART When you play this character, you may banish one of your items to give chosen character +2 {S} this turn.
flavor_text: "Take this magical stone. You'll need it to keep up with me!"

name: Mushu
text: LET'S GET THIS SHOW ON THE ROAD {E} â Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
flavor_text: "Move, move, move! There's no time to explain. Well, maybe a little time, so listen up..."

name: Cri-Kee
text: AT HER SIDE While you have 2 or more other exerted characters in play, this character gets +2 {L}.
flavor_text: "You were so focused on me and Mulan that you forgot about my man Cri-Kee here. And that was a mistake!" âMushu

name: Lafayette
flavor_text: "What are we guarding the kitchen for, Napoleon? There ain't no scarabs 'round here. Call me when there's somethin' serious that needs fixin'."

name: Figaro
text: PLAYFULNESS Opposing items enter play exerted.
flavor_text: "Say hello to Figaro. Up to mischief already!" âGeppetto

name: Thumper
text: YOU CAN DO IT! {E} â Chosen character gets +3 this turn.
flavor_text: C'mon! Let's show that mean old high sultan what's what."

name: Wreck-It Ralph
text: CHARGED UP When you play this character, chosen Racer character gets +4 {S} this turn.
flavor_text: "Let's burn rubber, kid!" âWreck-It Ralph

name: Tinker Bell
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
PAY ATTENTION Whenever you play a character with 5 {S} or more, you may exert them to gain 2 lore.

name: Lilo
text:
STOMPIN' TIME! During your turn, if you've played 3 or more actions this turn, you may play this character for free.
RAAAWR! When you play this character, ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

name: LeFou
text: ALL FOR ME {E}, Banish one of your items â Chosen opponent loses 1 lore and you gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: "LeFou, sometimes you really take the cake." âGaston

name: Lumiere
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Lumiere.)
Evasive, Ward
SACREBLEU!: Whenever one of your items is banished, this character gets +1 {L} this turn.

name: The Coachman
text: WILD RIDE While 2 or more characters of yours are exerted, this character gets +2 {S} and gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

name: Mulan
text:
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
BURST OF SPEED During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
LONG RANGE This character can challenge ready characters.

name: Mushu
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mushu.)
ALL FIRED UP Whenever you play another character, they gain Rush, Reckless, and Evasive this turn. (They can challenge the turn theyâre played. They canât quest and must challenge if able. They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Mr. Snoops
text: DOUBLE-CROSSING CROOK! During your turn, when this character is banished, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "You can't do this to me, you swindler! We had a verbal agreement!"

name: Friend Owl
flavor_text: "Sand? In the forest? I'll bet some magical miscreant's up to no good. Well, it's none of my concern. I'm going back to bed."

name: Faline
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
PRECOCIOUS FRIEND While you have a character in play with more {S} than each opposing character, this character gets +2 {L}.

name: Prince John
text: HELP! HELP! Whenever an opponent plays a character, deal 1 damage to this character.
flavor_text: Even a frightened lion still has claws.

name: Nothing We Won't Do
text:
Sing Together 8 (Any number of your or your teammatesâ characters with total cost 8 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
Ready all your characters. For the rest of this turn, they take no damage from challenges and can't quest.

name: Get Out!
text: Banish chosen character, then return an item card from your discard to your hand.
flavor_text: Leave now. Before I change my mind." âThe Beast

name: Light the Fuse
text: Deal 1 damage to chosen character for each exerted character you have in play.
flavor_text: A bold act can change the course of battle.

name: Twitterpated
text: Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
flavor_text: A mysterious phenomenon that makes you feel both invincible and vulnerable at the same time.

name: Most Everyone's Mad Here
text: Gain lore equal to the damage on chosen character, then banish them.
flavor_text: "Well, some go this way, some go that way. But as for me, myself, personally, I prefer the shortcut."

name: The Sword of Shan-Yu
text: WORTHY WEAPON {E}, {E} one of your characters â Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
flavor_text: "I know what this means to you." âThe Emperor

name: The Mouse Queen
flavor_text: "After that dreadful Ratigan business, I know about villains. This Jafar is certainly a villain of the highest order."

name: Sir Pellinore
text: CODE OF HONOR Whenever this character quests, your other characters gain Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text: "Together, lads, we prevail!"

name: Anita Radcliffe
text: I'LL TAKE CARE OF YOU When you play this character, you may give chosen Puppy character Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

name: Olaf
text: ENDLESS TALE When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -1 {S} this turn.
flavor_text: "It began with two sisters. One born with magical powers, and one born powerless. Their love of snowmen, infinite."

name: Anna
text: WE CAN DO THIS TOGETHER When you play this character, if you have a character named Elsa in play, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Wasabi
text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
flavor_text: "Okay, so the plan is 'leave Wasabi to watch our backs while we steal the crown.' Good to know."

name: Go Go Tomago
text: NEED THIS! When you play a Floodborn character on this card, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: "Check it out! This 'ink' offers so many possibilities."

name: The Wardrobe
text: I HAVE JUST THE THING! {E}, Choose and discard an item card â Draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: "Time to try something new, dear."

name: Mrs. Potts
text: CLEAN UP {E}, Banish one of your items â Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Now, don't fret over the mess, love. We'll have everything shipshape in no time."

name: Jasmine
text: JUST WHAT YOU NEED When you play this character, you may give another chosen character Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

name: Little Sister
text: LET ME HELP When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.
flavor_text: As Skippy's older sister, she's had lots of experience putting things back together.

name: Adelaide Bonfamille
flavor_text: "Beautiful music can ennoble one's spirit, no matter how dire things seem."

name: Nani
text:
STICK TO THE PLAN {E} â Another chosen character gains Resist +2 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)
IT'S UP TO YOU, LILO Your characters named Lilo gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

name: Stitch
text:
SO NAUGHTY When you play this character, each opponent puts the top card of their deck into their inkwell facedown and exerted.
STEALTH MODE At the start of your turn, if this card is in your discard, you may choose and discard a card with {IW} to play this character for free and he enters play exerted.

name: Ratigan
text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
TIME RUNS OUT At the end of your turn, if you didn't put any cards into your inkwell this turn, banish this character.

name: Arthur
text: NO MORE BOOKS Skip your turn's Draw step.
flavor_text: "Do you want to be all muscle and no brain?" âMerlin

name: Bernard
text: GO DOWN THERE AND INVESTIGATE When you play this character, if you have an Ally character in play, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "Miss Bianca, over here! I found something!"

name: Aladdin
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
SAFE PASSAGE Whenever one of your Ally characters quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from this character.

name: Jasmine
text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.)
ALWAYS PLANNING Whenever this character quests, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Ally character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Roquefort
text: SAFEKEEPING Whenever this character quests, you may put chosen item into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: "Jafar will never expect us to hide lore from him in his own safe! How exciting!"

name: Jumba Jookiba
flavor_text: This little thing has a much more rudimentary design than if I had created it. But if you were rushing development, then this makes sense.

name: Geppetto
text: SEEKING INSPIRATION Whenever this character quests, you may choose and discard any number of item cards to gain 1 lore for each item card discarded this way.
flavor_text: Everything he carves is a work of art.

name: Heads Held High
text:
Sing Together 6 (Any number of your or your teammatesâ characters with total cost 6 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.) 
Remove up to 3 damage from any number of chosen characters. All opposing characters get -3 {S} this turn.

name: Pouncing Practice
text: Chosen character gets -2 {S} this turn. Chosen character of yours gains Evasive this turn. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
flavor_text: "Check out this cool trick my dad taught me!" âSimba

name: Down in New Orleans
text:
(A character with cost 6 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character, item, or location card with cost 6 or less and play it for free. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Television Set
text: IS IT ON YET? {E}, 1 {I} â  Look at the top card of your deck. If it's a Puppy character card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.
flavor_text: Thunderbolt's show was one thing all the puppies could agree on.

name: Belle's Favorite Book
text: CHAPTER THREE {E}, Banish one of your other items â Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavor_text: Some stories stay with you forever.

name: Atlantean Crystal
text: SHIELDING LIGHT {E}, 2 {I} â Chosen character gains Resist +2 and Support until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2. Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)

name: Atitaya
flavor_text: "Spears of Fang, stand strong and tall. We are the last line of defense and we will not fall!"

name: Bobby
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavor_text: "You come at me, you get the beak, capisce?"

name: Magic Carpet
text:
Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)
SPECTRAL FORCE Your other Illusion characters gain Challenger +1. (They get +1 {S} while challenging.)

name: Prince Achmed
text: UNWELCOME PROPOSAL When you play this character, you may exert chosen Princess character.
flavor_text: "Talk about overdressed and self-absorbed!" âJasmine

name: Dumptruck
text: LET ME AT 'EM When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text: "Say, let me do it, Mad Dog. It's my turn."

name: Captain Hook
text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
flavor_text: "How dare you? Arm yourself, scoundrel!"

name: General Li
text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
flavor_text: A single grain of rice can tip the scale. One man may be the difference between victory and defeat. âThe Emperor

name: Monterey Jack
text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

name: Genie
text: BUG CATCHER During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Toby Turtle
text: HARD SHELL While this character is exerted, he gains Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
flavor_text: "This place is scarier than Prince John."

name: Arianna
flavor_text: "In dark times, a crown is a weighty honor we must bear with grace and courage."

name: Zipper
text:
BEST MATES If you have a character named Monterey Jack in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
BURST OF SPEED During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: Khan
flavor_text: "When the whole world changes around you, remember that Khan will always be the sameâsteadfast and true." âFa Zhou

name: Vinnie
text: LEARNING EXPERIENCE During an opponent's turn, whenever one of your other characters is banished, gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: "That's quite a predicament you're in. Glad it ain't me."

name: Iago
text: SELF-PRESERVATION While you have another exerted character in play, this character can't be challenged.
flavor_text: "Nice try, chumps! Too bad I'm all the way up here!"

name: Nathaniel Flint
text: PREDATORY INSTINCT You can't play this character unless an opposing character was damaged this turn.
flavor_text: "Flint's secret trove was never found, but stories have persisted that it remains hidden..." âNarrator

name: Vincenzo Santorini
text: I JUST LIKE TO BLOW THINGS UP When you play this character, you may deal 3 damage to chosen character.
flavor_text: "Never be afraid to make a big entrance."

name: Namaari
text:
STRATEGIC EDGE When you play this character and at the start of your turn, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
EXTREME FOCUS This character gets +1 {S} for each card in your discard.

name: Mickey Mouse
text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
THE BIGGEST STAR EVER When this character is banished, deal 5 damage to each opposing character.

name: Stitch
text: I WIN! During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card and gain 1 lore.
flavor_text: "Ah! Finally, a good use for his destructive instincts." âJumba Jookiba

name: Desperate Plan
text: If you have no cards in your hand, draw until you have 3 cards in your hand. Otherwise, choose and discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.
flavor_text: "It's my decision. My choice. And you won't stop me." âNamaari

name: Beyond the Horizon
text:
Sing Together 7 (Any number of your or your teammatesâ characters with total cost 7 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
Choose any number of players. They discard their hands and draw 3 cards each.

name: Quick Shot
text: Deal 1 damage to chosen character. Draw a card.

name: Hamster Ball
text: ROLL WITH THE PUNCHES {E}, 1 {I} â Chosen character with no damage gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

name: Lady
text:
PACK OF HER OWN Whenever you play a character, this character gets +1 {S} this turn.
TAKE THE LEAD While this character has 3 {S} or more, she gets +2 {L}.

name: Wreck-It Ralph
text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Wreck-It Ralph.)
BACK ON TRACK When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may return a Racer character card with cost 6 or less from your discard to your hand. If you do, gain 1 lore.

name: Perdita
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Perdita.)
QUICK, EVERYONE HIDE When you play this character, you may put all Puppy character cards from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: It Means No Worries
text:
Sing Together 9 (Any number of your or your teammatesâ characters with total cost 9 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return up to 3 character cards from your discard to your hand. You pay 2 {I} less for the next character you play this turn.

name: Bambi
text:
SAY HELLO When you play this character, gain 1 lore.
KIND OF BASHFUL When an opponent plays a character, return this character to your hand.

name: Kuzco
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kuzco.)
WHAT DOES THIS DO? When you play this character, each opponent chooses one of their characters and puts that card on the bottom of their deck. Then, each opponent may draw a card.

name: Mother Gothel
text: LOOK WHAT YOU'VE DONE When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to give that character Challenger +1 and "When this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand" this turn. (They get +1 {S} while challenging.)

name: Fantastical and Magical
text:
Sing Together 9 (Any number of your or your teammatesâ characters with total cost 9 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
For each character that sang this song, draw a card and gain 1 lore.

name: Into the Unknown
text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Put chosen exerted character into their player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

name: Rapunzel
text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
WRAPPED UP Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character canât quest during their next turn.

name: Captain Hook
text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.)
GIVE 'EM ALL YOU GOT! Once during your turn, whenever an opposing character is damaged, your Pirate characters get +2 {S} and gain Resist +2 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

name: Wrong Lever!
text:
Choose one:
- Return chosen character to their player's hand.
- Put a card named Pull the Lever! from your discard on the bottom of your deck to put chosen character on the bottom of their player's deck.

name: Lilo
text:
STOMPIN' TIME! During your turn, if you've played 3 or more actions this turn, you may play this character for free.
RAAAWR! When you play this character, ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

name: Mushu
text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mushu.)
ALL FIRED UP Whenever you play another character, they gain Rush, Reckless, and Evasive this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played. They can't quest and must challenge if able. They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

name: The Sword of Shan-Yu
text: WORTHY WEAPON {E}, {E} one of your characters â Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

name: Stitch
text:
SO NAUGHTY When you play this character, each opponent puts the top card of their deck into their inkwell facedown and exerted.
STEALTH MODE At the start of your turn, if this card is in your discard, you may choose and discard a card with {IW} to play this character for free and he enters play exerted.

name: Jasmine
text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.)
ALWAYS PLANNING Whenever this character quests, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Ally character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Desperate Plan
text: If you have no cards in your hand, draw until you have 3 cards in your hand. Otherwise, choose and discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.
